alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 2:32PM MDT until July 08 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 232 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Briggsdale, or 22 miles northeast of Greeley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Briggsdale around 235 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Keota. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
